attributes.action: Reinvest money back into policing to stamp out knife crime and more stop/search.
attributes.additional_details: The evidence is all around u on social media / papers / tv screens radio etc. At the start of 2018 from January to April there was 1,299 stabbings with loads of fatalities  and so far this year 26 people have died. HOW MANY MORE STABBINGS AND DEATHS BEFORE YOU SORT THIS OUT. ITS NEEDS TO BE SORTED OUT NOW BEFORE MORE PEOPLE DIE.(what if it was ur family member stabbed and died what would u do ????)
attributes.background: More money should be given to the police and more police officers on the street so that they can combat knife crime.The last few years knife crime has been at an all time high due to lack of funding cuts and due 2 less police on the street. if funds not given knife crime will rise dramatically .
